import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' const CertificateTable = () => { const[addFormData, setAddFormData]= useState({ Fullname:'', Email:'', Department:'', Position:'', Account:'', Start_date:'', Status:'', Training_category:'', End_date:'', Training_date:'', Course_name:'', Training_delivery:'', Provider:'', Instructor_name:'', Training_status:'', Certificate_expiration_date:'', Comments:'' }) const handleAddFormChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const fieldname = event.target.getAttribute("name"); const fieldvalue = event.target.value; const newFormData = {...addFormData}; newFormData[fieldname] = fieldvalue; setAddFormData(newFormData); } return (
